name: Murgtal
overview: Murgtal in Switzerland is renowned for its high-quality granite and diverse boulder routes. The stunning alpine views and the ideal summer season attract climbers from around the world. A must-visit destination.

Murgtal, en Suiza, es famoso por su granito de alta calidad y la diversidad de rutas de boulder. Las impresionantes vistas alpinas y la temporada ideal en verano atraen a escaladores de todo el mundo. Un destino imprescindible.
